channel.title: Clean Version of Project untiled pkz
channel.description:
This is a Clean server of Project untiled pkz
Mostly all i did was remove most Npc's, Clean the shops, Put an easy guide In to add item into the shops Changed the Prices of items to what i thought they Should be and put a guide to that too. Any questions feel free to post, use his client and all the pictures and info you need are on his thread.
Ops made a mistake on the name of server sorry about that. Idk why I put it as Project Unforgiven, its Project untiled pkz.
Here is the link to the post:
Download Link: http://uppit.com/5uxg9tunumzy/Project_Unforgiven_Clean.rar
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,454978.0.html
And virus Scan for everyone: http://tinypic.com/view.php?pic=2db84jr&s=7
